¡Bienvenido!

b2evolution is a professional blog engine. It supports multiple blogs, edited by multiple users and in multiple languages. Plus, it's free, it's open-source (GPL) and it runs virtually anywhere (PHP 4 / MySQL 3.23)!

Encontrarás información detallada en la página oficial de b2evolution.

WARNING: This is an ALPHA release. This means there are still bugs in this release and some features are incomplete. Nethertheless, we manage to use it on a daily basis despite of these limitations. So we made a release. But you have been warned: use at your own risk! :->

NOTE: This version is and will continue to be fully supported in the upgrading scheme and procedures.

Instrucciones:

b2evolution se puede configurar en poco minutos. Sigue las instrucciones dependiendo de tu caso:

  • Instalar b2evolution desde cero
  • Actualizar de una versión anterior de b2evolution
  • Actualizar desde otro gestor de conenitos:
    • Cafelog/b2
    • Movable Type
